comment: His studio class is easy, and he is very understanding and gives students much of class time to work on projects and for 1-on-1 critiques, though he takes a while to grade. His D-com class is more difficult, as he has less of an understanding of digital media, but he matches D-com to his studio class so the software you learn is usable immediately.

He is a great professor! His lectures are very interesting, and he encourages everyone to participate in them. I had him for Arch 1000, and I think he was awesome for a first architecture class. I would definitely take him again, if I could.

Professor Gainey was the best! Gave very clear directions for his assignments and allowed for a lot of exploration to easily run into inventing things with the software. I learned a lot from him and his amazing TAs that also were there to answer many of my questions. All around he's a wonderful and patient professor.
